Name: The Way of Life Free Edition
About the game: The Way of Life makes the player relive the same life's experiences from the point of view of three characters of different ages: an adult, an old man and a child. The experiences we want to tell about are very different, they go from a quarrel to a dream, and further to more serious topics like death and love. The main point about the game is that every experience will be told through different gameplay mechanics​.​ Also, every playable character has his own specific mechanics and a way to see the world. The player throughout the game can explore and live different stories and feel a variety of emotions in an amusing and captivating experience.
